turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 89th Medium Tank Battalion (United States).
turn.1: What was the 89th Medium Tank Battalion (United States)?
turn.2: 89th Medium Tank Battalion (United States) The 89th Medium Tank Battalion was an armored tank unit of the United States Army.
turn.4: It was activated in Korea in August, 1950 and in November 1951, it was assigned to the 25th Infantry Division.
turn.5: What battles did it fight in?
turn.6: The unit participated no fewer than ten campaigns, from 1951 through the Armistice in 1953 with the 26th Division.
turn.8: It earned the Presidential Unit Citation and the Navy Unit Commendation.
turn.10: The 89th Tank Battalion returned to Hawaii with the 25th Infantry Division where it remained until deactivation in 1957.
